reviews.review: Terrible matchmaking and Camping Killers have destroyed the game. Hackers own this game and there is no easy way to report them.

I really love this game but there are a lot of problems. Worst thing is between survivors and killers balance. I've been playing this game over 1000 hours. But nowadays, I met around 10 hours killers....WTF...Roll back MMR idiots. KR server and JP server is dying because you guys "Behavior". You have to patch for killers, idiots. Newbie killers are dying due to UUUUUUUUU! You have to buff killers more. 

Many Survivor users don't like Nurse and Blight and Spirit. So what? I don't care. But Behavior, you have to care about that. Newbie killers disappear completely? Next is survivor users. ^^ 

Wake up Behavior. Don't destroy your game. See future, not today.

The game is simple. You are either the bad guy or the good guy trying to escape. The bad guy chases the players around as they try and repair generators spread around the maps. Once you have repaired enough generators an escape area will pop up. The game will get the blood pumping and playing with friends makes it that much more enjoyable. I will definitely be telling my friends about it!

oyun √ßok iyi ama hileli oyuncu gelme olasƒ±lƒ±ƒüƒ± √ßok fazla ve oyun optimizasyonu √ßok k√∂t√º d√ºzeltilmesi gereken ≈üeyler var ama bunlarƒ±n haricinde oyun a≈üƒ±rƒ± iyi 100 TL ye deƒüer

tl;dr - Great concept let down by developers who have shown no interest in making their game fun

The core concepts of this game are great, but it is incredibly clear that none of the developers know how to make it actually fun to play. Nothing is properly balanced, with some perks being so much better than others that you will very rarely see anything outside of the current meta. Both sides are forced to bring the same things to every match in order to have a real chance of winning, leading to games becoming stale very quickly. 

The skill based matchmaking that was added is great in theory, but it has been so poorly implemented and just thrown in haphazardly that it only serves to make matches even less fun. Because the matchmaking treats killer matches as a 1v1 against each survivor, Killers that get some early wins against other new players will rank up incredibly fast until they are forced into constant matches with survivors who have 600+ hours of playtime more than them. Games will feel either incredibly easy or absolutely impossible, neither of which are truly fun. As a result, the number of killers has been plummeting, cause survivor queue times to increase dramatically.

Playing as a survivor with your friends is the only way to really have fun, but doing so is massively unfair to killer players, due to the devs not balancing around the information party members give each other at all.
its fun and realy the only game i play
nice game. but needs aloot of time to be competent.

Can be buggy and the community can be a bit toxic, but the game is fun overall. There is a slight learning curve, though, with all the killers, perks (for both killer and survivor gameplay), general game mechanics, and in-game etiquette.

This game and its community are garbage. After dedicating 1k+ hours across multiple platforms and getting called racial and transphobic slurs, I can say with the utmost confidence that anyone who likes games like this should steer clear of Dead by Daylight. 

Besides the fact the devs are terrible at keeping promises and there's something bugged every patch, the player base at times is just as terrible if not worse than the game they play. 

If you want to have fun with your friends, look for something else. This game is not the game. If you want fun that isn't reliant on whether others want you to have fun, find a different game. You'll probably enjoy literally any other game than this one. 

I strongly recommend anyone and everyone to steer clear of this game.
